sourcesContent:
import { makeStyles } from "@mui/styles";

const personalStyle = makeStyles({
    Box : {
        margin: "0",
        padding: "10%",
        height: "700px",
        width: "650px",
        boxShadow: "5px 10px 20px #000",
        display: "flex",
        flexDirection: "column",
        justifyContent: "center",
        borderRadius: "30px",
        userSelect: "none",
        background: "#fff",
        gap: "1rem",
    },
    AboutMeDiv: {
        height: "40%",
    },
    AboutMe : {
        marginTop: "15px",
        width: "95%",
        height: "100%",
        background: "#e0dede",
        justifyContent: "center",
        display: "flex",
        padding: "10px",
        border: "none",
        outline: "none",
        borderRadius: "20px",
        fontSize:"16px",
        resize: "none",
    }
})

export default personalStyle
